name: EMBARKER "Accidental Plagiarism"
description:
"Accidental Plagiarism" cassette by Embarker available now!
Embarker is the solo project of Brooklyn / Philadelphia based audiovisual artist Michael Barker. "Accidental Plagiarism" is mb's seventh release under the moniker "Embarker" and his second release on Heat Retention Records. The first side features 4 tracks recorded in early November 2012 that run the gamut from a sonic tantrum to a slow creep around a flooded and burnt out Breezy Point, NY. Side two is a grinding one take recording of self oscillating synths and vocals. Limited edition of 43. Heat Retention Records #36

name: EMBARKER "Big Gary"
description:
Embarker is the solo project of Brooklyn based audiovisual artist Michael Barker. "Big Gary" shows a strong taste for the liminal sonic spaces of modified and homemade electronics, synths, and stringed pseudo-instruments in the creation of organic, rhythmic "noise" works. A fine entry in the spleencoffin catalog, and an excellent companion/follow-up to last year's Embarker cassette on I Just Live Here.
Inserts and labels are handmade typewriter text on yellow lined memo paper with a drawing by "Thomas Clark". Limited edition of 50 copies. First 20 copies feature special extra-limited edition "Big Gary" rub-on vinyl letters on the cassette shell exterior.

name: EMBARKER "The Lamprey Chronicle"
description:
New Cassette Out on "I Just Live Here"

"Scathing gurgle electronics from an odd variety of musical
equipment. Laptops, modular synths, drum pads, maybe a little
Hawaiian guitar and some mumbles combine to form a wall of oozing
audio unpleasantries."

name: EMBARKER S/T LP
description: Limited Edition of 300 hand silk screened LP. 10 Tracks 30 minutes.
